text: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse is a zombie comedy film published by Christopher Landon and written by Landon, Carrie Evans, Emi Mochizuki and Lona Williams. Starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller, Joey Morgan, Sarah Dumont and David Koechner. The film was released in the United States on 30 October 2015 from Paramount Pictures, It received mixed reviews from audiences. ==Plot== * Tye Sheridan as Ben Goudy * Logan Miller as Carter Grant * Joey Morgan as Augie Foster * Sarah Dumont as Denise Russo * David Koechner as Scout Leader Rogers * Halston Sage as Kendall Grant * Cloris Leachman as Ms. Fielder * Niki Koss as Chloe * Hiram A. Murray as Corporal Reeves * Lukas Gage as Travis * Drew Droege as drunk man * Patrick Schwarzenegger as Jeff * Blake Anderson as Ron the Janitor * Elle Evans as Amber * Dillon Francis as DJ zombie * Sara Malakul Lane as Beth Daniels * Cameron Elmore as the nerdy kid ==Related pages== * Office Uprising (2018) * Night of the Living Deb (2016) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2015 movies Category:Zombie movies Category:American movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Apocalyptic movies
title: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
